text: Hyaenanche globosa is a species of plant under the family Picrodendraceae. It is the sole member of the genus Hyaenanche and the subtribe Hyaenanchinae.Lambert, Aylmer Bourke. 1797. A description of the genus Cinchona 52 It is endemic to Cape Province in South Africa.Govaerts, R., Frodin, D.G. & Radcliffe-Smith, A. (2000). World Checklist and Bibliography of Euphorbiaceae (and Pandaceae) 1-4: 1-1622. The Board of Trustees of the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew. ==See also== * Taxonomy of the Picrodendraceae ==References== Category:Picrodendraceae Category:Monotypic Malpighiales genera Category:Flora of South Africa
title: Hyaenanche
